Retro Bowl.description: This is a 2D football game where your goal is to win the Retro Bowl!
Retro Bowl.controls:
CTRL+W to move forward.
Also, you can drag the mouse to throw the ball.
There is a tutorial to help you play!

Papa's Pizzeria.description: Ever wanted to have your own pizza restraunt? Here you go!
Papa's Pizzeria.controls:
Use your mouse to click buttons, not make keyboard controls.
There is also a tutorial.

Drift Boss.description: Simple but addictive car drifting game. Collect coins and upgrade your car.

Chess.description: Online board game where your could play against a friend or the computer.
Chess.controls: Use your mouse to drag the piece you want to move
